snippet: Kyle Bass, a Texas hedge fund investor who profited from betting against the mortgage market, now thinks some of the worst bonds could yield 14 percent in the coming years.
abstract: Kyle Bass, a Texas hedge fund investor who profited from betting against the mortgage market, now thinks some of the worst bonds could yield 14 percent in the coming years.

headline.main: Once Shorting Subprime, Bass Now Bullish on Mortgage Bonds
